Text:
The complete batch of outtakes can be streamed from the Internet Archive -- http://www.archive.org/details/gd69-xx-xx.sbd.dodd.16760.sbeok.shnf 
That was my source back when you could still download shorten files from the Archive. They were a bit raw with nasty cuts and drop-outs in certain tracks, so I put together this CD for my own listening pleasure. But I wouldn't want to deprive anyone of the pleasure of hearing the originals.
